content.question: In contrast to the consistently bright and flattened colors on the left side of the work, the right side is composed of only black-and-white images of varied values, suggesting that the artist not only wished to emphasize the process used but also was

choices.label: intrigued by the actress’s recent death
influenced by the work of photojournalists
fascinated by the loss of fame and fortune

content.answer: intrigued by the actress’s recent death

topic.text: 4.1: Interactions Within and Across Cultures in Later European and American Art

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Explain how and/or why context influences artistic decisions about form, style, materials, content, and/or function in the creation or meaning of a work of art (or group of related works of art).
